body: "What century is Cuban television living in?": Octavo Cerco is amazed by the claims of a television program, saying: "That the new technologies have arrived, there is now no doubt, because they themselves say it’s so. But it’s thanks to the tenacity of the Cuban people in accessing everything the government has tried to steal from us."
original_body: "What century is Cuban television living in?": Octavo Cerco is amazed by the claims of a television program, saying: "That the new technologies have arrived, there is now no doubt, because they themselves say it’s so. But it’s thanks to the tenacity of the Cuban people in accessing everything the government has tried to steal from us."
title: Cuba: New Technology, Old Ideas
